content: the court in rome has made a final ruling on a case involving the division of a community inheritance the court has dissolved the community inheritance and ordered the distribution of two apartments among the parties involved each party currently occupying an apartment on the same street has been assigned full ownership of their respective apartment the courts decision is based on the fact that the parties are de facto coheirs and the market value of the properties the court has also determined that there is no opposition to the division and has allocated the costs of the courtappointed expert equally between the parties the court has made a final ruling and dissolved the community inheritance the properties involved are two apartments located on different streets each party has been assigned 50 ownership of one apartment the court has ordered the parties to compensate each other for court costs with the costs being split equally the court has further ordered the competent registrar to transcribe the judgment this ruling was made on may 29 2017
